alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Coffee, northwestern Pierce, northeastern Atkinson, north central Ware, Bacon, northwestern Wayne, eastern Jeff Davis and Appling Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Plant Hatch to 7 miles northeast of Alma to Pearson. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baxley, Alma, Graham, Surrency, Plant Hatch, Nicholls, Odum, New Lacy, Pine Grove and Bickley. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne
